newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-SOUNESS RESIGNS AS SOUTHAMPTON MANAGER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SOUNESS RESIGNS AS SOUTHAMPTON MANAGER.

text.p: Graeme Souness resigned as manager of Southampton on Saturday, less than a year after joining the English premier league club.
The former Scottish international captain is understood to have been lined up to take over at Italian second division club Torino. He is a former Sampdoria player.
Souness took over as Southampton manager last July after being sacked by Turkish club Galatasaray.
He succeeded in keeping Southampton in the premier league, though their safety was secured only on the final day of the season two weeks ago.
